item.title: 交易员仍认为美联储至少有两次大规模减息即将到来
item.description: 美国利率期权市场的交易商仍在押注美联储今年至少会有一次超大规模的降息，只是可能不会在11月5日美国大选之前。【原文：Traders in the US interest-rate options market are still betting on at least one super-sized Federal Reserve interest-rate cut this year — just probably not before the Nov. 5 US election.】

item.title: Corebridge 预计替代品的长期回报率为 8%至 9
item.description: Corebridge Financial Inc.首席执行官凯文-霍根（Kevin Hogan）表示，他预计该公司 55 亿美元的另类投资组合将产生 8%至 9%的长期收益，尽管最近几个季度未达到这一目标。【原文：Corebridge Financial Inc. Chief Executive Officer Kevin Hogan said he expects the firm’s $5.5 billion alternative investment portfolio to generate longer-term gains of 8% to 9%, despite falling short of that target in recent quarters.】

item.title: 日本央行削减债券购买量为日本投资者开辟新机遇
item.description: 随着日本央行放慢购债速度，当地投资者却反其道而行之，限制了债券收益率的上升压力。【原文：As the Bank of Japan slows debt purchases, local investors are doing just the opposite, limiting upward pressure on bond yields.】

item.title: 大选在即，特朗普媒体选项成本飙升，锁定期即将结束
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的媒体公司的股票期权成本已飙升至自 3 月份开始交易以来最昂贵的水平，因为交易员们都在为大选相关的波动性和内幕交易锁定期的结束做准备。【原文：The cost of options on shares of Donald Trump’s media company has surged to the most expensive since it first started trading in March as traders brace for election-related volatility and the end of a lockup period on insider sales.】

item.title: 如果回报落后于现金，ExodusPoint 将为客户提供更低的费用
item.description: ExodusPoint 资本管理公司（ExodusPoint Capital Management）为客户提供了一个机会，如果其基金在一年内的表现不优于三个月期国债，则无需支付业绩费用。【原文：ExodusPoint Capital Management is giving clients the chance to pay no performance fee if its fund doesn’t fare better than three-month Treasuries over the course of a year.】

item.title: GameStop 在销售下滑的情况下仍实现意外盈利
item.description: GameStop 公司连续第四个季度销售额下滑，但这家视频游戏零售商却意外实现了盈利。【原文：GameStop Corp. reported a fourth consecutive quarter of falling sales, though the video-game retailer reported an unexpected profit.】

item.title: 加拿大皇家银行麦凯称加拿大正走在 "错误的道路上"，需要进行税制改革
item.description: 加拿大皇家银行高层表示，加拿大的经济政策已经偏离了轨道，它需要一个更具竞争力的税收制度和与美国更紧密的关系。【原文：Royal Bank of Canada’s top executive said the country’s economic policy has veered off track, and it needs a more competitive tax regime and a tighter relationship with the US.】

item.title: 波哥大在长达数月的缺水问题上再添停电风险
item.description: 哥伦比亚首都自 4 月以来一直实行配给供水，现在可能不得不重新加强限制。【原文：Colombia’s capital, which has been rationing water since April and may have to re-tighten restrictions, is now also at risk of power cuts amid delays in building new transmission corridors.】

item.title: 高盛称全球降息周期利好美元
item.description: 高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc.【原文：The downside risk to the US dollar posed by the Federal Reserve’s coming interest-rate cuts is limited because other central banks are easing policy, too, according to an analyst from Goldman Sachs Group Inc.】

item.title: 摩根大通引领银行前景黯淡，破坏了规则上的胜利
item.description: 美国银行在新的资本规则方面从监管机构那里获得了重大突破，但却因为贷款前景不乐观而破坏了自己的庆祝活动。【原文：US banks scored a big break from regulators on new capital rules — only to ruin their own celebration with downbeat outlooks on lending.】

item.title: Big Lots 的银行和潜在买家讨论其 7.6 亿美元的出价
item.description: 折扣零售商 Big Lots Inc. 的贷款方正在与 Nexus Capital Management 商讨该私募股权公司如何为其 7.6 亿美元的收购出价提供资金，使其摆脱破产困境。【原文：Lenders to discount retailer Big Lots Inc. are talking to Nexus Capital Management about how the private equity firm would finance its $760 million bid to buy the company and bring it out of bankruptcy.】

item.title: 债券市场面临通胀低于美联储目标的危险
item.description: 美联储与通胀的斗争已经进行了两年，债券投资者看到了新的风险：消费者价格正在过度降温。【原文：Two years into the Federal Reserve’s battle against inflation, bond investors are seeing a new risk: Consumer prices are cooling too much.】

item.title: 高盛股票模型挑战 ESG 假设
item.description: 高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc.【原文：At Goldman Sachs Group Inc., there’s an ESG filter that tells investors to buy coal giant Glencore Plc, and avoid Big Tech staples Microsoft Corp. and Alphabet Inc.】

item.title: 收购公司 GTCR 正就收购德国制药商 Stada 进行深入谈判
item.description: 据知情人士透露，收购公司 GTCR 正在就可能收购德国仿制药制造商 Stada Arzneimittel AG 进行深入谈判。【原文：Buyout firm GTCR is in advanced talks on a potential acquisition of German generic drugmaker Stada Arzneimittel AG, people with knowledge of the matter said.】

item.title: 埃克森首席执行官誓言：如果激进分子 "滥用 "代理规则，将起诉更多激进分子
item.description: 埃克森美孚公司（Exxon Mobil Corp.）的高级管理人员誓言，如果更多激进投资者继续 "滥用 "代理投票程序，他将对其提起诉讼，而就在几个月前，针对 Arjuna Capital LLC 的诉讼被联邦法官驳回。【原文：Exxon Mobil Corp.’s top executive vowed to sue more activist investors if they continue to “abuse” the proxy voting process, just months after a lawsuit against Arjuna Capital LLC was dismissed by a federal judge.】

item.title: 巴西对冲基金重量级人物转而看淡当地利率
item.description: 巴西对冲基金经理对当地资产的悲观情绪加倍，现在正瞄准该国的利率市场下注。【原文：Brazilian hedge fund managers have doubled down on their pessimism with local assets, and are now targeting wagers in the country’s rates market.】

item.title: 高盛的科斯汀敦促遏制股指洗牌
item.description: 高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc.【原文：Goldman Sachs Group Inc. has a message for benchmark managers who are weighing big reshufflings of their indexes to account for a handful of stocks growing to interstellar size: slow down.】

item.title: 巴西公司力促卢拉在补税问题上达成更好的协议
item.description: 巴西总统路易斯-伊纳西奥-卢拉-达席尔瓦（Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva）通过解决企业税务纠纷来平衡预算的计划正面临障碍，因为一些巴西大公司坚持要求获得更好的待遇。【原文：President Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva’s plan to balance the budget by reaching settlements in corporate tax disputes is facing hurdles as some large Brazilian companies hold out for better deals.】

item.title: 艾略特薪酬最高的英国董事在 2023 年获得 2,900 万英镑的收入
item.description: 埃利奥特投资管理公司（Elliott Investment Management）英国薪酬最高的高管去年获得了近 2,900 万英镑（3,800 万美元）的收入。【原文：Elliott Investment Management’s highest-paid executive in the UK received almost £29 million ($38 million) last year.】

item.title: 默多克的 REA 开始与英国房地产门户网站 Rightmove 商谈收购事宜
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，澳大利亚房地产上市服务提供商 REA Group Ltd. 在确认对英国市值最大的房地产门户网站 Rightmove Plc 感兴趣几天后，已开始与该公司进行初步收购谈判。【原文：Australian real estate listing provider REA Group Ltd. has started preliminary takeover talks with Rightmove Plc, days after confirming its interest in the UK’s biggest property portal by market value, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 桑坦德银行削减波兰分行股份，为增长和回购提供资金
item.description: 桑坦德银行（Banco Santander SA）正在出售其波兰分支桑坦德波兰银行（Santander Bank Polska S.A.）的股份，以重新配置资本。【原文：Banco Santander SA is selling down its stake in its Polish arm Santander Bank Polska S.A as it looks to redeploy capital.】

item.title: SLB 表示，锂技术的突破使大规模工厂更接近现实
item.description: 全球最大的油田服务供应商 SLB 公司表示，它在一个锂项目上取得的成果证明，有朝一日它可以在商业规模上生产这种电池金属，同时减少对环境的影响。【原文：SLB, the world’s biggest oilfield services provider, said it achieved results at a lithium project that prove it can some day produce the battery metal at a commercial scale with less impact on the environment.】

item.title: Grifols 持有者呼吁家族和布鲁克菲尔德公司提供 "合理价格
item.description: Grifols SA 的一些大股东正在向这家西班牙血浆公司施加越来越大的压力，要求它在与收购方布鲁克菲尔德资产管理公司（Brookfield Asset Management）的谈判中寻求大幅溢价。【原文：Some large Grifols SA shareholders are increasing pressure on the Spanish blood plasma firm to seek a substantial premium in talks with suitor Brookfield Asset Management.】

item.title: 摩根士丹利的图劳斯基离开亚洲，转任全球银行业职务
item.description: 根据彭博社看到的一份备忘录，摩根士丹利亚太区投资银行主席迪特尔-图洛夫斯基（Dieter Turowski）将前往美国担任该部门全球副主席和最大科技公司顾问的新职位。【原文：Dieter Turowski, Morgan Stanley’s chairman of investment banking for Asia-Pacific, will move to the US for a new position as global vice chairman of the division and adviser to the biggest technology firms, according to a memo seen by Bloomberg.】

item.title: 惠誉称，州预算在科维德繁荣-萧条之后回归 "正常 "状态
item.description: 多年来，美国各州一直在不确定但最终有利的经济环境中徘徊。但现在，惠誉评级公司表示，科维德时代的波动和强劲增长正在消退，经济正在恢复正常。【原文：For years US states have been navigating uncertain, yet ultimately favorable, economic conditions. But now, Fitch Ratings says that the volatility and strong growth of the Covid era is subsiding in a return to normalcy.】

item.title: 刚果向三大贸易巨头出售 Tenke 铜矿
item.description: Glencore Plc、Mercuria Energy Group 和 Trafigura Group 正在从刚果民主共和国的国有矿业公司购买铜，这也是该公司首次销售来自合资项目的金属。【原文：Glencore Plc, Mercuria Energy Group and Trafigura Group are buying copper from the Democratic Republic of Congo’s state miner, which is marketing metal from joint-venture projects for the first time.】

item.title: 花旗认为一些科技公司仍在权衡今年在美国上市的可能性
item.description: 花旗集团（Citigroup Inc. ）的一位高级银行家表示，少数几家科技公司正考虑在今年最后三个月内在美国交易所上市，从而刺激了潜在首次公开募股（IPO）的热潮。【原文：A handful of tech companies are considering going public on US exchanges during the last three months of the year, a top Citigroup Inc. banker said, stoking the pipeline of potential IPOs.】

item.title: 摩根大通是为英国贝隆公司处理逾 80 亿欧元债务的银行之一
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，摩根大通、法国巴黎银行和美国银行等银行将为英国汽车玻璃维修和更换公司贝隆（Belron）出售超过 80 亿欧元（88 亿美元）的债务，所得资金将用于偿还到期债务和为股东派息提供资金。【原文：JPMorgan Chase & Co., BNP Paribas SA and Bank of America Corp. are among banks set to market over €8 billion ($8.8 billion) in debt for UK vehicle glass repair and replacement company Belron, with the proceeds to go toward pushing out debt maturities and funding a shareholder payout, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: EIA 最新预测：美国石油需求将在 2024 年达到顶峰
item.description: 据美国能源信息署（Energy Information Administration）预测，今年美国石油需求增长将趋于平稳，这是市场最新的看跌指标。【原文：US oil demand growth is forecast to plateau this year, in the latest bearish indicator for the market, according to the Energy Information Administration.】

item.title: 投资者出走使 Wamco 关键债券基金规模缩水至 150 亿美元以下
item.description: 投资者的赎回潮使西部资产管理公司（Western Asset Management Co.【原文：A wave of investor redemptions slashed the size of Western Asset Management Co.’s flagship core plus bond fund below $15 billion, a decline of more than one-third so far this year, as clients pull back after a federal investigation of the firm’s veteran trader and co-chief investment officer Ken Leech.】
